1:
How long, Yahweh, will you keep forgetting about me?\q How long will you hide your face from me?
\q
2:
How long must I worry\q and have grief in my heart all day?
\q How long will my enemy triumph over me?


\q
3:
Look at me and answer me, Yahweh my God!\q Give light to my eyes, or I will sleep in death.
\q
4:
Do not let my enemy say, "I have defeated him,"\q so that my enemy may not say, "I have prevailed over my adversary"; otherwise, my enemies will rejoice when I am brought down.


\q
5:
But I have trusted in your covenant faithfulness;\q my heart rejoices in your salvation.
\q
6: I will sing to Yahweh\q because he has treated me very generously.
